about_the_game:
Rumble and smash!
Cube Clash is an online fighting game in which you can pick a unique historically and pop-culture inspired cube fighter and smash your friends in sequences of one-hit rounds games.

In a world where everything is made up of cubes, in the era known as prehistory an event occurred that will lead to the greatest conflict for humanity. A caveman found a sphere, upon discovering it his fellow prisoners of greed proceeded to fight for the sphere, thus the war for the sphere began.

All known empires have the sphere in their possession, which led to their destruction. The holy wars were an excuse to get the sphere and even the second world war had to do with the sphere, until everything exploded with the creation of nuclear bombs.

But even in the remains of humanity, the fight continues to obtain the sphere.

Cube Clash features:
Local Multiplayer - now you can play with other friend, in the future they will be able to play up to 4 players at the same time.
Online Multiplayer - in development
Multiple Skins - you can choose between 9 skins now and in the future there will be more!
Huge catalog of weapons - find your own combat style!

name: Cube Clash: Rumble and Smash

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1 or newer
  • Processor: i5 6600K or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050 or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 450 MB available space
